app_name: Groups Control Groups Streaming Apps BBC America
app_description: Get caught up in your favorite BBC America shows with full episodes video extras and sneak peeks at upcoming series. Log in with your cable or satellite provider to watch BBC America LIVE or full episodes of Killing Eve Top Gear The Graham Norton Show and more of your favorite series. Plus you can search the library and track recently viewed episodes and resume where you left off. Most full episodes require a cable or satellite login though season premieres are sometimes made available with no login required. You can also sample trailers and behind the scenes clips. New episodes are available in season usually the day after broadcast. Use your iPhone or iPad to Airplay or cast to your television.
